Articles.Content: I have only played about 13 hours of KSP, but there is a glitch that will not let me hire more kerbals. It just started happening but I can't play the game because of this. Please help me.
Sounds like you are in career mode. If this is true, you may need to upgrade certain portions of your space complex to increase your available maximums.

so.... what happened to the ones you did hire.... did you.....kill them?

YOU MONSTER!!!!

Quote

Sounds like you are in career mode. If this is true, you may need to upgrade certain portions of your space complex to increase your available maximums.

Like the astronaut building.

As has been said, upgrade the astronaut building.  However, the easier answer is to rescue them from space.  Even if you don't consider what the contract pays it's cheaper to send a rocket after a Kerbal than recruit one.  (Admittedly, the type you get this way is random.)

4 hours ago, Loren Pechtel said:

As has been said, upgrade the astronaut building.  However, the easier answer is to rescue them from space.  Even if you don't consider what the contract pays it's cheaper to send a rocket after a Kerbal than recruit one.  (Admittedly, the type you get this way is random.)

You also don't need to upgrade your complex this way. Rescuing Kerbals from orbit is some of the easiest ways to make funds; therefore by the time those contracts no longer show up, I have all the Kerbals my careers will ever need without needing to upgrade my astronaut complex.
